text:
After he received his first vaccine, this 85-year-old man in Peru got up and danced for joy. He said he's looking forward to his second shot, so he can go back to the club and dance 🕺

#COVID #COVID19 #Vaccine #Dance #Positivity #GoodVibes #Grandfather #Elder #Senior #FirstDose https://t.co/k8J9iS9nSk
